sentences.sContent: He usually does quite well, but it’s not a certainty.
sentences.sCn: 通常他都做得相当好，但也并不一定。

sentences.sContent: The only certainty is that there will need to be major changes.
sentences.sCn: 唯一能够确定的事就是需要重大的变革。

remMethod.val: 来自certain(a. 确定的， 必然的)

words.tran: 某一；必然的；确信；无疑的；有把握的
确实的事情；必然的事情；计算机紧急反应小组

trans.tranCn: 必然， 肯定；必然的事
trans.tranOther: something that is definitely true or that will definitely happen
